title: Justo Tejada
content:
Justo Tejada Martínez (6 January 1933 – 31 January 2021) was a Spanish footballer who played as a forward. He was capped by Spain on 8 occasions, scoring 4 goals. He died on 31 January 2021.[2]

Born in Barcelona, Catalonia, Tejada began playing football with the youth side of CE Europa. He played professionally with FC Barcelona, where he won La Liga and the Copa del Rey.[3]

Barcelona

Real Madrid
